author: THESMEL
title: 18 runs 45 passes
text: Location: Mesa AZ/ Lakeside AZ Posts: 3,668 We passed ourselves to death again - BA looks like whisenhunt - sheep in wolfs clothing I'm not intimidated, won't be bullied and won't be laid a hand on! In Christian tradition there are 4 cardinal virtues : Prudence - able to judge between actions with regard to appropriate actions at a given time Justice - proper moderation between self-interest and the rights and needs of others Restraint or Temperance - practicing self-control, abstention, and moderation Courage or Fortitude - forbearance, endurance, and ability to confront fear and uncertainty, or intimidation
